entries: An unseen servant is {@condition invisible}, though it normally doesn't {@action Sneak}, so it is usually only {@condition hidden}.
top.name: Invisible

entries: An unseen servant's physical body is made of force. It can't use {@trait attack} actions. It can move and use {@action Interact} actions to do things such as fetch objects, open unstuck or unlocked doors, hold chairs, and clean. It can't pass through solid objects.
bot.name: Force Body
